entries.message:
Event Type: Network Emergency

We are performing system changes in the Amsterdam location during the following emergency maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-03-14 15:05:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-03-14 19:05:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Amsterdam instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the emergency maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
